mapper.select: select id, directory, file_name, from_table, table_id, pic_type, reserv1, reserv2, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from picture_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into picture_info(directory, file_name, from_table, table_id, pic_type, reserv1, reserv2, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values (#{directory}, #{fileName}, #{fromTable}, #{tableId}, #{picType}, #{reserv1}, #{reserv2}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{updateTime}, #{updateBy})

insert into picture_info(directory, file_name, from_table, table_id, pic_type, reserv1, reserv2, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.directory}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.fromTable}, #{entity.tableId}, #{entity.picType}, #{entity.reserv1}, #{entity.reserv2}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})

insert into picture_info(directory, file_name, from_table, table_id, pic_type, reserv1, reserv2, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) values
(#{entity.directory}, #{entity.fileName}, #{entity.fromTable}, #{entity.tableId}, #{entity.picType}, #{entity.reserv1}, #{entity.reserv2}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.updateBy})
on duplicate key update directory = values(directory), file_name = values(file_name), from_table = values(from_table), table_id = values(table_id), pic_type = values(pic_type), reserv1 = values(reserv1), reserv2 = values(reserv2), create_time = values(create_time), create_by = values(create_by), update_time = values(update_time), update_by = values(update_by)
mapper.update:
update picture_info
directory = #{directory},
file_name = #{fileName},
from_table = #{fromTable},
table_id = #{tableId},
pic_type = #{picType},
reserv1 = #{reserv1},
reserv2 = #{reserv2},
create_time = #{createTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
where id = #{id}
